line.text: O from what power hast thou this powerful might
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: With insufficiency my heart to sway
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To make me give the lie to my true sight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And swear that brightness doth not grace the day
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whence hast thou this becoming of things ill
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That in the very refuse of thy deeds
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: There is such strength and warrantise of skill
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That in my mind thy worst all best exceeds
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Who taught thee how to make me love thee more
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The more I hear and see just cause of hate
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O though I love what others do abhor
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: With others thou shouldst not abhor my state
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If thy unworthiness raised love in me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: More worthy I to be beloved of thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
